t: Ord. No. 96-06. AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON ADOPTING A NEW ZONING ORDINANCE IN ITS ENTIRETY INCLUDING INCORPORATION OF PREVIOUSLY ADOPTED CHAPTERS PERTAINING TO OFF-STREET PARKING; AREA, YARD AND HEIGHT; SIGNS AND PLANNED COMMUNITY; AND REPEALING SPECIFIC SECTIONS OF TITLES X AND XI AND ALL OF TITLE XII OF THE NAPA COUNTY CODE ADOPTED BY THE CITY UPON INCORPORATION; AND ADOPTION OF A NEW ZONING MAP ESTABLISHING THE DISTRIBUTION OF ZONING DISTRICTS CONTAINED IN THE NEW ZONING ORDINANCE.
sp: library|us/ca/cities/american-canyon/ordinances|1996|City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 96-06
